page.title: 08FOOD AND DRINK
page.content: These days{food and drink}are quite dear. We eat many different kinds of food, such as{vegetables, fruit}and {meat.}For a family of four{a week's {food bill}costs about{Â£50.00. Most people tend to eat{chicken, {beef, lamb}&{pork.}Favourite vegetables are{carrots, potatoes}& { {sweetcorn.}Popular fruits are{apples, {oranges, bananas, pineapple}&{peaches. In our class most people like to drink{Coke}or{lemonade,}which are probably the most popular{fizzy drinks there are.{Quatro}and{Dr.Pepper}are not so popular. Drinks that are not fizzy are called{still}drinks. They are usually concentrated and so you have to add water to them, to dilute them, before they are drunk. {Fast food shops}are very popular.{ {Fish & chips}and{burgers}with{onions & {relish}can be bought quickly.
